choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction:
For libreoffice calc write an expression to copy contents from another cell and remove all single quotes

### Response:

To complete this task, you can use the following expression in LibreOffice Calc:
```
=CLEAN(A1)
```
This expression will copy the contents of cell A1 (excluding any single quotes) to another cell. To remove all single quotes from the copied text, you can use the following expression:
```
=CLEAN(CLEAN(A1))
```
This expression will clean the text by removing all single quotes using the CLEAN function twice.
